Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People across Australia are eagerly anticipating the upcoming Federal Budget which will include measures aimed at providing relief to those struggling with the cost of living. The government has pledged extra support for low- and middle-income families with childcare assistance and tax cuts among the measures designed to ease the financial pressure. However concerns remain that the measures may not go far enough with the ongoing economic impact of the pandemic leaving many Australians vulnerable to financial hardship.
